trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that holds the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il peer di automazione è associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"> </xref> che contiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type name of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del tipo dell'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"> </xref> che è associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione un valore che specifica il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , or value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is the , , or value; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"></xref> into the visible region of the container.
trans-unit.target: Scorre il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory"> </xref> nell'area visibile del contenitore.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un'implementazione esplicita dell'interfaccia di un membro.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: E può essere utilizzato solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer>esegue il cast dell'istanza di un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider>interfaccia.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer>
